text: Irene Caba Alba (25 August 1905 – 14 January 1957) was an Argentine-born Spanish stage and film actress. She appeared in forty films during her career including The Nail.Hortelano p.176 She was born into a family of actors, the daughter of Irene Alba and the sister of Julia Caba Alba. ==Selected filmography== * The Dancer and the Worker (1936) * Whirlwind (1941) * The Nail (1944) * Thirsty Land (1945) *The Prodigal Woman (1946) * The Faith (1947) * The Sunless Street (1948) * Guest of Darkness (1948) * The Duchess of Benameji (1949) * That Luzmela Girl (1949) * Woman to Woman (1950) * Such is Madrid (1953) * An Andalusian Gentleman (1954) * An Impossible Crime (1954) * The Big Lie (1956) == References == == Bibliography == * Hortelano, Lorenzo J. Torres. Directory of World Cinema: Spain. Intellect Books, 2011. == External links == * Category:1905 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Argentine emigrants to Spain Category:Argentine film actresses Category:Argentine stage actresses Category:Spanish film actresses Category:Spanish stage actresses Category:Actresses from Buenos Aires Category:20th-century Argentine actresses Category:20th-century Spanish actresses
title: Irene Caba Alba
